summary: Changes the color of all soul gems (excluding Azura/Black Stars). Black Soul Gems are dark green, Greater & Grand Gems are light green, Common and below are somewhat swampy light green soul gems.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/-s2qNEDCn4mo/UNzj-pNYEAI/AAAAAAAAAo4/m34KKqctedk/s800/dmcline.png[/img][/center]

[heading]Description:[/heading]
Changes the color of all soul gems (excluding Azura/Black Stars). Black Soul Gems are dark green, Greater & Grand Gems are light green, Common and below are somewhat swampy light green soul gems.

[heading]Change Log:[/heading]

[u][b]Version 1.0 (Published January 30th, 2013)[/b][/u]
- Basic Components:
 - Dark Green Black Soul Gems
 - Green Grand/Greater Soul Gems
 - Swamp Green Common/Lesser/Petty Soul Gems

[u][b]Version 2.0 (Published January 30th, 2013)[/b][/u]
- Better Colors
- Better Gem Reflections
- Green Soul Gem Fragments

[u][b]Version 3.0 (Published January 30th, 2013)[/b][/u]
- Adds Green Azura\'s Star (Star, Broken, and Lite)
author: dmcthunder999
